title: Newsletter, "Design for Bohemian Life Newsletter, May 9, 1940", 1940
medium: Lithography in burgundy and grey ink on off-white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted on the cover across the center in burgundy ink: BOHEMIAN LIFE/ AS SEEN BY SAVARIN ST. SURE/ PUBLISHED BY THE BOHEMIAN DISTRIBUTING COMPANY
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The top of the cover has a grey box on the right with a grey and burgundy geometric design on its left side. The date is vertically imprinted on the left edge of the grey square. The newsletter discusses wine and food topics. There is text on all sides of the fold-out.

tombstone.epitaph:
Newsletter, "Design for Bohemian Life Newsletter, May 9, 1940", 1940.
1940. Lithography in burgundy and grey ink on off-white wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-159-1.
